page.title: 04EMPLOYMENT
page.content: There are at least 106 places of work in shops, garages, pubs, etc (each with an unknown number of employees), while at least 881 people work in the part of Haydock Lane industrial estate in this survey area,and 12 at Princess Pit. In relation to the amount of housing in this area there are insufficient jobs to support all the residents. This is borne out by a survey of some classes at Legh Vale school where 92% of fathers,and 89% of mothers in employment worked away from the locality. In the same survey 20% of fathers and 12% of mothers were self-employed.
